project_descr: To reduce the rapidly increasing economic burden and growing social tension on the Tunisian communities living in the areas bordering with Libya.

outputs.output_descr:
UNDP has provided livelihood assistance to the Tunisian governorates which border on Libya. The livelihoods program focuses on labor-intensive activities addressing infrastructure priorities, providing employment to the most affected and economically vulnerable populations. The program also works to strengthen local governance and strengthening local emerging civil society organizational participation and contribution to social cohesion capacities. By the end of 2011, the main results were: 
•	500 short-term jobs had been created in a southern governorate on the Tunisia-Libya border that bene

project_title: appui au relèvement économique et à la cohésion sociale
